@graph.name: Platform Overview | Btracking Tracking App
@graph.description: Access real-time locations and essential data for every vehicle, asset, and team member. Our intuitive platforms (Standard, ProFleet, Enterprise) deliver the precise insights your business needs.
@graph.keywords: GPS tracking platform, fleet management software, Standard Platform, ProFleet Platform, Enterprise Platform, vehicle tracking app, asset tracking dashboard

@graph.name: Btracking Software Platforms
@graph.description: A summary of Btracking's three GPS tracking and fleet management platforms.

item.name: Standard Platform
item.description: Ideal for most small to mid-size fleets, Standard provides functionality for organizing, vehicle sensor data, driver ID and behavior scoring, fuel monitoring, maintenance tracking, basic tool tracking, notifications, reports, and much more.

item.name: ProFleet Platform
item.description: ProFleet is ideal for truck fleets, school bus fleets, and specialized requirements. ProFleet features a comprehensive driver coaching dashboard, integrated AI dashcams, advanced tool and tool inventory tracking, the LoRa yard management system, and Air Trackers.

item.name: Enterprise Platform
item.description: Rich in detail yet simple to use, Enterprise is the total package. Designed specifically for mid to large fleets, Enterprise provides a full array of tools, apps and reporting features designed specifically for logistics, transportation and trucking businesses.

mainEntity.name: Why does Btracking have three platforms?

acceptedAnswer.text: Because fleets have differing needs, and we found that one platform is not suitable for every fleet.

mainEntity.name: What is the Standard Platform best for?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our Standard Platform has everything a small to mid-sized fleet requires without bloat.

mainEntity.name: What is the Pro Fleet Platform best for?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our Pro Fleet Platform is great for truck fleets, school buses, and tool tracking with 360 dashcam support, comprehensive driver analysis and coaching, and an industry-leading School Bus and Student Management System.

mainEntity.name: What is the Enterprise Platform best for?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our Enterprise Platform is a comprehensive system for logistics offering dispatch, route planning, navigation, driver coaching, fuel reporting & fuel card integration and more.
